entry.title: New release for Otter Wiki: v2.11.0
entry.content:
Compare with v2.10.6

Features

  • added SIDEBAR_MENUTREE_FOCUS setting that allows to always display all pages in the sidebar, see #169 (495cca1).
  • added rss/atom feeds of the changelog, see #255 (8f53031).
  • enable fragments in wikilinks, e.g. [[wikilinks#fragment]], see #246 (f60f6e9).

Deloyment Features

  • docker image: www-data uid/gid is set to PUID/PGID, see #252 (a46520a).
  • docker "-slim" image can handle --user to change the uid/gid, see #252 (f32fd07).

Bug Fixes

  • Unicode characters breaking page history, see #253 (3640ccf).

Code Refactoring and Chores

  • followed pyright suggestions, cleaned up (e24f648).
  • Spelling corrections by @blukid in https://github.com/redimp/otterwiki/pull/248
  • chore(deps): bump flask from 3.1.0 to 3.1.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/redimp/otterwiki/pull/249

New Contributors

  • @blukid made their first contribution in https://github.com/redimp/otterwiki/pull/248

entry.title: New release for Otter Wiki: v2.11.1
entry.content:
Compare with v2.11.0

Bug Fixes

  • markdown files are no longer listed as attachments, see #254. (514417a).
  • Dockerfile use ENV not ARG for PUID and PGID (438b4ac).
  • workaround for unraid templates with PGID=100, see #257 (d27f993).

entry.title: New release for Otter Wiki: v2.12.0
entry.content:
Compare with v2.11.1

Features

  • handle .md suffix in URLs, pointing to Pages, see #267 (a924afe).
  • improved the <head> <meta og:...> tags: site name and descriptions based upon the pages content (d10eea8).
  • added SITE_LANG to configure the lang attribute of the html element (3d897a4).

Bug Fixes

  • handle existing PUID and PGIDs so that containers can restart, see #257 (ec9a3c6).
  • set the download_name when an attachment is requested by revision, see #260 (e20de72).
  • default mimetype set to octet-stream, see #260 (4eca70f).
  • increased proxy read/send timeout for nginx, see #254 (5d35f4a).

entry.title: New release for Otter Wiki: v2.13.0
entry.content:
Features

  • added editor shortcuts: bold, italic, link, insert/format table, mostly done by Dan Falcone @dafalcon, see PR#251
  • enabled spellchecking (via the browser) in the editor (0a7e44a).
  • url pasting: When pasting an url on a selected word, the url is pasted as markdown link [word](https://pasted.url). See #259.
  • url button (and shortcut): If a text has been selected when the button is pressed, a markdown link is inserted. The selected text becomes the description and the cursor is placed so that the url can be entered. (379799). This was discussed in #251.

Bug Fixes

  • typo in PGID check (a5bbeba).

Compare with v2.12.0
